questions.question_text: The Palo Alto Networks Cloud Identity Engine (CIE) includes which service that supports Identity Providers (IdP)?

discussion.content:
A is the correct answer
The Cloud Identity Engine consists of two components: Directory Sync, which provides user information, and the Cloud Authentication Service, which authenticates users. For a more comprehensive identity solution, Palo Alto Networks recommends using both components, but you can configure the components independently.
OAuth2 bearer token required for SCIM.

Selected Answer: C
The Cloud Authentication Service uses a cloud-based service to provide user authentication using Security Assertion Markup Language 2.0 (SAML)-based identity providers (IdPs) or Open Authorization (OAuth) 2.0-based IdPs.
